mapper.select: SELECT p.id, p.user_id, p.product_name, p.category_id, c.category_name, p.spec_id, s.spec_name, p.stock_qty, p.price, p.purchase_price, p.last_sales_date, p.total_sales, p.staff, p.created_by, p.created_at, p.updated_by, p.updated_at, p.deleted_flg FROM products p LEFT JOIN category c ON p.category_id = c.id LEFT JOIN spec s ON p.spec_id = s.id WHERE p.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${orderDirection} OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{limit} ROWS ONLY
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM products WHERE user_id = #{userId}
